name: bloom
description: Bloom is an open-source project to show how authentication really works
author: Kyle Graham Matzen <kgrahammatzen@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/server" "npm run dev -w apps/frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w packages/core -w packages/client -w packages/node -w packages/react -w packages/server
